articles.title: Malnourished emperor penguin that swam ashore in Australia 2,000 miles from home a quandary for rescuers - CBS News
articles.description: Rescuers are trying to rehabilitate an emperor penguin that came ashore some 2,000 miles from its natural habitat, and what comes next is "still being worked through."
articles.content:
Project Earth: Emperor penguins threatened by climate change
